---
title: "snow colors"
output: html_document
---

```{r}

library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

setwd("~/Documents/dev/snow")

data <- read.csv('breaks.csv')

data %>%
	filter(type != 'nsoaa') %>%
	ggplot(aes(position, snow, color=type)) +
	geom_point() +
	geom_line() +
	xlab('position in palette') +
	ylab('snow (inches)') +
	labs(title = 'Snow totals color palette breaks')

```
